verify-description: If you are a professional seeking new job opportunities, it's important to verify your experience. Here, we'll show you how to do it
bennefits-subtitle: and elevate your selection processes with reliable work experience validation
step-1-body: Provide your personal email address and the password you used when creating your account
step-2-body: Navigate to the darshboard section where you can access to your account overview
step-title-3-desc: to the experience and education section.
step-3-body: Scroll down to locate the experience and education section. Here, you will find a verification symbol represented by a blue checkmark placed next to your experience.
modal-payment-verify-body: Your subscription is now active. Now you can view talents with information verified and enhance your selection process.
how-see-exp: How do I see my verified
how-see-content: If you are a talent looking for new opportunities, it is important that you verify your work and study experience. Here we show you how you will see them
how-see-content-1: *We are verifying profiles and experience on an ongoing basis, so you can expect yours to be verified soon
modal-verify-success-title: The talent information will be evaluated!
modal-verify-success-body: We will notify you within 48 hours.
